data.title: Heather Tom
data.meta_description:
Heather Tom. Actress: Reich und schön. Heather Tom is a 5-time Emmy Award winner and has starred as Katie Logan on CBS' Reich und schön (1987) since 2007, where she has also directed nearly 20 episodes of the show over the past three years. In 2018, she was nominated for a Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Drama Series Directing Team.

In 2013, Variety included Heather on its list of "Daytime TV...
data.text: Left Schatten der Leidenschaft (1973) in 2003 after 13 years because she wasn't happy with her lack of storyline and because the producers tried to renegotiate her contract to get her to take a substantial cut in pay. Very soon after that, she joined Liebe, Lüge, Leidenschaft (1968) in the recast role of Kelly Cramer and has openly expressed her delight with the show and the role.
